publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4111 Bristow Muldoon: Congratulations to West Lothian Council—That the Parliament congratulates West Lothian Council on the award of the title "UK Council of the Year" by the Local Government Chronicle; notes that West Lothian Council is the first Scottish council to win this prestigious award, and recognises that this has been achieved as a result of sustained excellence in service delivery, through the commitment of the staff of the council and the highly effective political leadership, and that this award follows on from the Accounts Commission report last year which praised the council’s good practices and strong commitment to improvement. Supported by: Michael McMahon*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Des McNulty*, Robin Harper*, Helen Eadie*, Jackie Baillie*, Scott Barrie*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Cathy Peattie*, Trish Godman*
S2M-4111 Congratulations to West Lothian Council (lodged on 14 March 2006) Maureen Macmillan*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-4111 Congratulations to West Lothian Council (lodged on 14 March 2006) Sarah Boyack*

S2M-4111 Bristow Muldoon: Congratulations to West Lothian Council—That the Parliament congratulates West Lothian Council on the award of the title "UK Council of the Year" by the Local Government Chronicle; notes that West Lothian Council is the first Scottish council to win this prestigious award, and recognises that this has been achieved as a result of sustained excellence in service delivery, through the commitment of the staff of the council and the highly effective political leadership, and that this award follows on from the Accounts Commission report last year which praised the council’s good practices and strong commitment to improvement. Supported by: Michael McMahon, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Des McNulty, Robin Harper, Helen Eadie, Jackie Baillie, Scott Barrie, Mr Frank McAveety, Cathy Peattie, Trish Godman, Maureen Macmillan, Mr Jamie Stone, Sarah Boyack

S2M-4111 Congratulations to West Lothian Council (lodged on 14 March 2006) Bill Butler*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Karen Gillon*, Janis Hughes*
S2M-4111 Congratulations to West Lothian Council (lodged on 14 March 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4111 Congratulations to West Lothian Council (lodged on 14 March 2006) Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S2M-4111 Congratulations to West Lothian Council (lodged on 14 March 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4111 Congratulations to West Lothian Council (lodged on 14 March 2006) Susan Deacon*
